source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_SEQ_00<tab>Lucia is not one to rest on her laurels.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_SEQ_00<tab>Люсия не из тех, кто будет спокойно наблюдать.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_SEQ_01<tab>As you and the others debate how best to proceed, Ser Aymeric enters the room in the company of lords Edmont and Artoirel to the delight and relief of all present. Alas, the resulting mood of optimism is soon soured by the arrival of a panicked knight bearing grave tidings: a rebel faction calling themselves the True Brothers of the Faith have seized control of the Vault, and taken the refugees sheltering within hostage. Needless to say, the lord commander cannot bow to the demands of such zealots, leaving him with but one option: an armed assault. Without hesitation, you and your fellow Scions volunteer to help, prompting Lord Artoirel to pledge his support as well.

TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_SEQ_02<tab>Though you succeed in sneaking into the basilica undetected, the rebels soon catch wind of your presence, and attempt to execute the hostages. Fortunately, they are no match for you and your allies, and together you are able to rescue all but one of their captives─a young girl named Maelie, whom you learn was borne off to the upper levels by a priest. You, Ser Aymeric, and Lord Artoirel have no choice but to give chase.

TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_SEQ_03<tab>You finally corner the priest on the uppermost level of the Vault, and Ser Aymeric demands his immediate surrender. Alas, the man will not hear reason, being convinced beyond all doubt that Ser Aymeric is a traitor to both kin and country. In a final act of defiance, he throws Maelie from the ledge, sending the child tumbling towards the plaza.

Far below, Lucia and Y'shtola can only watch in horror as the screaming figure plummets towards them. But just when all hope seems lost, a great white dragon swoops down to pluck her from the very jaws of death. Vidofnir!

Soon after, you, Ser Aymeric, and Lord Artoirel join the others outside, where Vidofnir is waiting to deliver a warning from Hraesvelgr. It would seem Nidhogg and his brood have flown for skies unknown. When Alphinaud subsequently presses the dragon for answers regarding Estinien, she declares that she can provide none, and bids you farewell. Though her visit was all too brief, Ser Aymeric hopes that it will do much to change the opinions of the common man. Yet Lord Edmont, who does not share in his optimism, implores the young knight to move with greater caution, lest more perish in his headlong rush for change─not least Ser Aymeric himself, whom the count plainly cherishes as a son.

TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_SEQ_04<tab>In the wake of Vidofnir's departure, Y'shtola speaks to you privately regarding Thancred, in whom she senses a troubling change. According to her, his aetheric flow has been disrupted in a manner which would theoretically prevent him from wielding all magicks, teleportation included. Though she stresses that this is as yet mere speculation, it would do much to explain why he did not risk seeking out the Scions upon learning that a primal had been summoned. In the absence of proof, however, you have no choice but to remain silent and attend Alphinaud in Fortemps Manor.

TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_SEQ_05<tab>As you discuss recent events with Alphinaud and Tataru, lords Artoirel and Emmanellain enter, having come to present you all a token of their gratitude: a House Fortemps shield fit for a true knight. It soon becomes clear, however, that this was not Artoirel's only reason for seeking an audience when he reveals that Count Edmont means to step aside, leaving him to take his father's place as the head of House Fortemps. In this way, Count Edmont intends to rid the house of the lingering suspicion that it was complicit in a coup d'état orchestrated by Ser Aymeric. Yet while Lord Artoirel had long dreamed of this day, it would seem that the recent revelations regarding the founding fathers of Ishgard had prompted him to question the value of his birthright─until, that is, he recalled his late brother's words: “A knight lives to serve─to aid those in need.” And so he vows to follow Haurchefant's proud example and labor for the greater good of Ishgard. And should his resolve waver, he hopes that you will show him the way─as a <var 08 E905 ((sister)) ((brother)) /var>.

TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TODO_00<tab>Rendezvous with Aymeric in the Pillars.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TODO_00<tab>Отыщите Эмерика в Столпах. [Оригинальное название задания для поиска прохождения связанной миссии: «As Goes Light, So Goes Darkness».]

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Aymeric.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TODO_01<tab>Поговорите с Эмериком.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Alphinaud.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TODO_02<tab>Поговорите с Альфино.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Alphinaud at Fortemps Manor.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TODO_03<tab>Поговорите с Альфино в имении Фортамов.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TODO_04<tab>
TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TODO_05<tab>
TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TODO_06<tab>
TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TODO_07<tab>
TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TODO_08<tab>
TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TODO_09<tab>
TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TODO_10<tab>
TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TODO_11<tab>
TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TODO_12<tab>
TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TODO_13<tab>
TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TODO_14<tab>
TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TODO_15<tab>
TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TODO_16<tab>
TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TODO_17<tab>
TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TODO_18<tab>
TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TODO_19<tab>
TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TODO_20<tab>
TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TODO_21<tab>
TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TODO_22<tab>
TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TODO_23<tab>
TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_001<tab>How desperately we cling to that which we hold dear, knowing all the while that a day will come when we must let go.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_001<tab>Как отчаянно мы цепляемся за то, что нам дорого; прекрасно зная, что наступит день, когда нужно будет всё это отпустить.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ALPHINAUD_000_005<tab>It was not so long ago, was it...
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ALPHINAUD_000_005<tab>Не так уж и давно это было...

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_HILDA_000_010<tab>The past belongs to the dead. The future's ours to do with what we will.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_HILDA_000_010<tab>Прошлое принадлежит мёртвым. А грядущее — нам, и мы будем делать с ним всё, что захотим.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_THANCRED_000_015<tab>No more farewells. Not for a good while yet, at least.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_THANCRED_000_015<tab>Больше никаких расставаний. По крайней мере, не в ближайшем будущем.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_020<tab>Concentrate on freeing the hostages. I will tend to their wounds.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_020<tab>Сосредоточьтесь на спасении заложников. Я займусь их ранами.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ALPHINAUD_000_025<tab>Ready when you are, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ALPHINAUD_000_025<tab>Ждём только тебя, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_HILDA_000_030<tab>Bastards! If I had it my way, I'd be leadin' the charge myself!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_HILDA_000_030<tab>Мерзавцы! Если понадобится, я сама возглавлю атаку!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_SYMME_000_035<tab>Give 'em what for, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_SYMME_000_035<tab>Задайте им там жару, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_EUDESTAND_000_040<tab>Don't you dare let us down! Bring our people home safe!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_EUDESTAND_000_040<tab>Не смейте нас подводить! Верните наших родных домой невредимыми!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_LUCIA_000_045<tab>We will hold here, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. The Fury guide and keep you!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_LUCIA_000_045<tab>Мы закрепимся здесь, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Да направит тебя Яростная!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_THANCRED_000_050<tab>Just like old times, eh?
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_THANCRED_000_050<tab>Прямо как в старые-добрые, да?

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ARTOIREL_000_055<tab>Do not concern yourself with my safety. Lest you forget, I too am a knight.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ARTOIREL_000_055<tab>Не стоит беспокоиться за мою безопасность. Я ведь тоже рыцарь, в конце концов.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_HANDELOUP_000_057<tab>Pray keep in mind that the lord commander has not fully recovered from his wounds. Though the safety of the hostages is of paramount concern, I would ask that you do your utmost to dissuade him from engaging in any...heroics.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_HANDELOUP_000_057<tab>Учтите, что лорд-командующий ещё не оправился от ран. Конечно, спасение заложников прежде всего, но... вы уж там приглядите, чтобы он по случаю не начал геройствовать.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_000_060<tab>Listen well. We will enter the basilica silently via this gate. According to our latest reports, there are at least six hostages being held within. The numbers and readiness of the True Brothers of the Faith are unknown.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_000_060<tab>Слушайте внимательно. Мы войдём в холл незаметно, через вот эти ворота. Согласно последним данным, внутри удерживают по крайней мере шестерых заложников. Число и степень подготовленности злоумышленников нам неизвестна.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ARTOIREL_000_061<tab>I am told one claimed to have served under Thordan VII. Might the same be true of the rest?
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ARTOIREL_000_061<tab>Сказано лишь, что некоторые из них служили Тордану Седьмому. Возможно, все они?..

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_000_062<tab>Given the swiftness with which they seized control of the Vault, I think it highly likely, yes─which means that they may well possess the knowledge required to turn the building's defenses against us.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_000_062<tab>Учитывая скорость, с которой преступники захватили Свод, скорее всего, так и есть — а потому они, вероятно, располагают знаниями, что позволят им использовать защитные системы здания против нас.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_000_063<tab>Be that as it may, we have no choice but to press on. Lord Artoirel─you are a brave man and true, and none would dare question your honor if you chose not to risk your life in this endeavor. Are you certain you wish to join us?
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_000_063<tab>Неважно, что нас ждёт — мы просто обязаны действовать. Лорд Арторель, вы храбры и на вас можно положиться. Никто не усомнится в вашей чести, если вы откажетесь участвовать. Вы точно уверены, что желаете присоединиться?

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ARTOIREL_000_064<tab>I am no stranger to the battlefield, Ser Aymeric! My arm will not falter; my shield will not break! Halone as my witness, we will bring these fanatics to justice!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ARTOIREL_000_064<tab>Сражаться для меня не в новинку, сэр Эмерик! Моя рука тверда, а защита непоколебима. Халона мне свидетельница, я воздам этим фанатикам по справедливости!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_000_065<tab>Well said, my lord! Friends─follow me!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_000_065<tab>Хорошо сказано, милорд! Друзья, за мной!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_000_066<tab>Ser Simeonard! Lay down your arms and release the hostages, and you will be shown mercy! I give you my word!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_000_066<tab>Сэр Семенар! Сложите оружие и отпустите заложников, и вас пощадят! Даю вам слово!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TERRORIST_000_067<tab>(-Simeonard of the Holiest Flame-)Hah! The word of a heretic and kinslayer! I would sooner trust a dragon. Activate the knights! We shall show the hostages the same mercy he showed the archbishop!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TERRORIST_000_067<tab>(-Семенар Священный Огонь-)Ха! Слово еретика и отцеубийцы! Да я скорее поверю дракону. Активируйте рыцарей! Заложники получат то же, что получил Архиепископ!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TERRORIST_000_068<tab>(-Simeonard of the Holiest Flame-)Unlike you, Ser Aymeric, I am a man of honor. By my hand, you shall receive of the Fury's judgment!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TERRORIST_000_068<tab>(-Семенар Священный Огонь-)В отличие от тебя, сэр Эмерик, я человек чести. Моею рукою вам всем будет воздано от имени Яростной!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_000_069<tab>So it is to be a trial, then. Lord Artoirel, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─leave us and save the hostages! I will deal with Ser Simeonard!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_000_069<tab>Значит, лёгких путей мы не ищем. Лорд Арторель, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> — оставьте нас и спасайте заложников! Я разберусь с сэром Семенаром!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_THANCRED_000_070<tab>Well that was timely. Vidofnir must have been circling for hours.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_THANCRED_000_070<tab>Вот это было вовремя. Видофнир, должно быть, курсировала над городом часами.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_075<tab>In the moments before Vidofnir appeared, I contemplated teleporting the girl. Thank the Twelve that I did not.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_075<tab>За мгновения до того, как появилась Видофнир, я думала телепортировать девочку. Слава богам, я вовремя остановилась.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_LUCIA_000_076<tab>Since Haurchefant's death, Lord Edmont has grown ever more cautious. To speak plain, the man is afraid to hope. But I am not. Vidofnir's act of heroism <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> serve to shift public opinion in our favor, of that I have no doubt.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_LUCIA_000_076<tab>Со смерти Оршефана лорд Эдмонт стал слишком осторожным. Говоря простым языком, он боится надеяться. Но я не боюсь. Героическое деяние Видофнир обязательно склонит чашу весов народного мнения в нашу сторону, в этом я не сомневаюсь.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_HILDA_000_077<tab>After this, I reckon there'll be a few less folk cursin' dragons 'round here, and a few more cursin' the clergy─which is fine by me.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_HILDA_000_077<tab>После всего думаю, что тут станет поменьше людей, проклинающих драконов, и побольше народу, ненавидящего жрецов — по мне так неплохой расклад.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_SYMME_000_078<tab>Well, I'll be damned! Not only is Maelie safe, but she got to ride a dragon!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_SYMME_000_078<tab>Чтоб меня! Мэлли не только спасена, но и получила шанс прокатиться на драконе!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_EUDESTAND_000_079<tab>We're the only family Maelie's got─her and a lot of other children. All the more reason to strengthen the watch, I say.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_EUDESTAND_000_079<tab>Мы единственная семья, которая есть у Мэлли — как и у многих других детей. Мы уж приглядим за ними.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_HANDELOUP_100_079<tab>Words cannot well express our gratitude, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Thank you for rescuing the hostages...and for keeping the lord commander safe.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_HANDELOUP_100_079<tab>Словами не передать нашу благодарность, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Спасибо, что спасли заложников... и приглядели за лордом-командующим.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ALPHINAUD_000_080<tab>This has been a day of surprises, has it not? 'Tis but a pity Vidofnir could not stay longer.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ALPHINAUD_000_080<tab>Этот день был полон сюрпризов. Жаль только, что Видофнир не осталась подольше.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_THANCRED_000_081<tab>Yes, I think it's fair to say that she timed her departure rather less well than her arrival.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_THANCRED_000_081<tab>Да, она спланировала своё отбытие немного похуже, чем прибытие.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_082<tab>Well-timed scarcely does it justice. But one moment later would have been a moment too late.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_082<tab>«Вовремя» — это слабо сказано. Одним мгновением раньше или позже...

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ALPHINAUD_000_083<tab>Let us pray that the Ishgardians who yet harbored doubts will take these events to heart and accept the truth of Ser Aymeric's words.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ALPHINAUD_000_083<tab>Надеюсь, ишгардцы примут произошедшее близко к сердцу и поверят, наконец, в слова сэра Эмерика.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ALPHINAUD_000_084<tab>Well, 'tis only meet that I inform Tataru of what has occurred here. If you have need of me, I shall be at Fortemps Manor.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ALPHINAUD_000_084<tab>Ладно. Будет неплохо рассказать Татару обо всём, что произошло. Если понадоблюсь, ищите меня в имении Фортамов.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_THANCRED_000_085<tab>Allow me to accompany you. Tataru would never forgive me if I left for the Rising Stones without saying good-bye.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_THANCRED_000_085<tab>Позволь присоединиться. Татару не простит — в прошлый раз я ушёл из «Могучих камней» не попрощавшись.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_086<tab>A moment, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I wish a word.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_086<tab>Секундочку, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Хочу кое о чём поговорить.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_100_086<tab>Tell me, does Thancred seem quite well to you?
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_100_086<tab>Как считаешь, с Танкредом всё в порядке?

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_Q1_000_000<tab>Что вы скажете?

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_A1_000_000<tab>He held his own in the Vault.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_A1_000_000<tab>Он отлично держался в Своде.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_A1_000_001<tab>He got on well enough with Hilda.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_A1_000_001<tab>Он довольно живенько подобрался к Хильде.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_A1_000_002<tab>I'm not sure how to put it into words, but...
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_A1_000_002<tab>Не знаю, как сказать, но...

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_087<tab>That he did─which is especially remarkable given the injury to his eye. I can only assume that his time in the wilderness afforded him ample opportunity to compensate for his impairment.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_087<tab>Да, удивительно, учитывая его глаз. Время, проведённое в глуши, вряд ли благотворно повлияло на его раны.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_088<tab>However, I speak not of his physical state, but rather his aetheric flow, which I fear has been irreparably disrupted.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_088<tab>Но я говорю не о физическом его состоянии, а о потоке его эфира — который, как мне кажется, был серьёзно нарушен.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_089<tab>Of that I have no doubt. His time in the wilderness did not deprive him of his charm.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_089<tab>Даже не сомневаюсь. Проведи он в глуши годы, это не отняло бы его шарма.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_090<tab>But that is neither here nor there. What concerns me is his aetheric flow, which I fear has been irreparably disrupted.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_090<tab>Но меня беспокоит другое. Поток его эфира — который, как мне кажется, был серьёзно нарушен.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_091<tab>So you sense it too. A subtle change, imperceptible to most.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_091<tab>Значит, ты <var 08 E905 ((почувствовала)) ((почувствовал)) /var>. Едва заметное изменение, многие так и вовсе ничего не заподозрят.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_092<tab>I myself did not notice it at first, but upon closer examination, I saw that his aetheric flow had been irreparably disrupted.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_092<tab>Я и сама сперва не придала значения, но затем присмотрелась и увидела. Дело в потоке его эфира — который, как мне кажется, был серьёзно нарушен.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_093<tab>As a result, I strongly suspect that his ability to manipulate aether has been compromised. Simply put, Thancred may no longer be able to wield magicks.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_093<tab>Я подозреваю, что его способность управлять эфиром была утрачена. Говоря простым языком, Танкред не сможет владеть даже простейшей магией.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_094<tab>It would do much to explain why he chose to remain within the wilderness instead of seeking us out. He would have been compelled to rely solely on traditional methods of travel, significantly prolonging his journey. And when he learned that a nearby beast tribe was making preparations to summon a primal, it may well have seemed more sensible to wait.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_094<tab>Это могло бы объяснить, почему он решил оставаться так долго в глуши вместо того, чтобы попытаться нас отыскать. Ведь в противном случае ему пришлось бы полагаться на традиционные методы путешествия, которое могло бы занять месяцы... Даже когда он узнал, что звериное племя готовит призыв, остался там и наблюдал.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_095<tab>But this is still little more than speculation. Until I have proof, pray speak no word of it.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_095<tab>Конечно, всё это лишь догадки. Пока у меня не будет верных доказательств, не следует поднимать эту тему.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_096<tab>Right, then. I should be on my way. Krile may have charmed Master Matoya for now, but who can say how long it will last.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_000_096<tab>Ладно, я пойду. Крайл, возможно, и удалось ненадолго приручить Матойю, но кто знает, когда спящий вулкан снова пробудится.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_THANCRED_000_100<tab>
TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TATARU_000_105<tab>Lord Edmont told me all about what Vidofnir did! Gods, how I wish I had been there to see it.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TATARU_000_105<tab>Лорд Эдмонт рассказал мне всё, что случилось с Видофнир! Боги, хотелось бы и мне это увидеть!..

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_BUTLER01580_000_106<tab>When I heard the commotion, I went outside to look, but all I saw was the dragon's silhouette on the horizon...
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_BUTLER01580_000_106<tab>Когда мы заслышали шум, мы вышли наружу поглядеть, а там силуэт дракона над горизонтом!..

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_STEWARD_000_107<tab>It is a relief to see that you are unharmed, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>. Pray remain here a moment─Lord Artoirel should be returning shortly.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_STEWARD_000_107<tab>Рад видеть, что вы невредимы, <var 08 E905 ((госпожа)) ((господин)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Прошу, задержитесь на минутку — лорд Арторель должен вот-вот подойти.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_QIB_TODO_001<tab>Rescue the hostages!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_QIB_TODO_001<tab>Спасите заложников!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_QIB_TODO_AYMERIC_HP_GAUGE_NAME<tab>Aymeric's Vitality
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_QIB_TODO_AYMERIC_HP_GAUGE_NAME<tab>Здоровье Эмерика

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_QIB_TODO_HOSTILE_NUMBER<tab>Hostages Rescued
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_QIB_TODO_HOSTILE_NUMBER<tab>Заложников спасено

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_QIB_TODO_ATTACKED_HOSTILE_NUMBER<tab>Bonds Untied
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_QIB_TODO_ATTACKED_HOSTILE_NUMBER<tab>Развязано пут

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_001_001<tab>
TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_BATTLETALK_001_002<tab>'Twould seem our presence yet goes unnoticed. Come─we must secure the entrance.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_BATTLETALK_001_002<tab>Похоже, наше присутствие ещё не заметили. Пойдём — нужно обезопасить вход.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_BATTLETALK_001_003<tab>Remember: saving the hostages takes precedence over all else. Mind your attacks, and subdue the enemy quickly.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_BATTLETALK_001_003<tab>Помните: спасение заложников — высочайший приоритет. Глядите, на кого кидаетесь с мечом, и быстро разделайтесь с врагом.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_THANCRED_BATTLETALK_001_004<tab>
TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_THANCRED_BATTLETALK_001_005<tab>
TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_BATTLETALK_001_006<tab>
TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_BATTLETALK_002_001<tab>
TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_THANCRED_BATTLETALK_002_002<tab>
TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_HOSTAGE01_BATTLETALK_002_003<tab>You must hurry! The others were taken elsewhere by Ser Simeonard.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_HOSTAGE01_BATTLETALK_002_003<tab>Торопитесь! Остальных куда-то увёл сэр Семенар.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_THANCRED_BATTLETALK_002_004<tab>
TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_BATTLETALK_002_005<tab>
TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_THANCRED_BATTLETALK_002_006<tab>
TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_BATTLETALK_003_001<tab>I will hold the entrance and look after this one. Now go!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YSHTOLA_BATTLETALK_003_001<tab>Я останусь на входе и пригляжу за ними. Иди!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ARTOIREL_BATTLETALK_003_002<tab>Ser Simeonard? So this is indeed the work of the archbishop's former servants...
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ARTOIREL_BATTLETALK_003_002<tab>Сэр Семенар? Значит это и в самом деле проделки бывших прислужников Архиепископа...

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_BATTLETALK_003_003<tab>Secure the hostage, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Leave the others to us!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_BATTLETALK_003_003<tab>Спасай заложников, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Остальное предоставь нам!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TERRORIST_ZAKO_SWORD01_BATTLETALK_003_004<tab>
TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_003_005<tab>
TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ARTOIREL_BATTLETALK_003_006<tab>
TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ARTOIREL_BATTLETALK_003_007<tab>On your guard! They've sounded the alarum!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ARTOIREL_BATTLETALK_003_007<tab>Они забили тревогу! Готовьтесь!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TERRORIST_ZAKO_SWORD01_BATTLETALK_003_007<tab>
TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_THANCRED_BATTLETALK_003_008<tab>
TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TERRORIST_ZAKO_SWORD01_BATTLETALK_003_009<tab>
TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_HOSTAGE02_BATTLETALK_004_001<tab>Th-They took the others somewhere. I... It all happened so quickly...
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_HOSTAGE02_BATTLETALK_004_001<tab>О-они забрали остальных... Не знаю, куда... Всё произошло так быстро...

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_BATTLETALK_004_002<tab>
TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TERRORIST_ZAKO_ANY_BATTLETALK_005_001<tab>There they are! Let none escape!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TERRORIST_ZAKO_ANY_BATTLETALK_005_001<tab>Вон они! Не дайте им сбежать!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_005_002<tab>Keep going! I will hold them here!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_005_002<tab>Вперёд! Мы их здесь задержим!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_THANCRED_BATTLETALK_005_003<tab>Not alone you won't! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─stay with Ser Aymeric and Lord Artoirel!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_THANCRED_BATTLETALK_005_003<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, оставайся с сэром Эмериком и лордом Арторелем!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_BATTLETALK_005_004<tab>This way, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! To the Quire!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_BATTLETALK_005_004<tab>Сюда, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TERRORIST_LEADER_BATTLETALK_006_001<tab>
TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TERRORIST_LEADER_BATTLETALK_006_002<tab>
TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TERRORIST_LEADER_BATTLETALK_006_003<tab>
TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_BATTLETALK_006_004<tab>Come, then! Let us see whom the Fury favors!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_BATTLETALK_006_004<tab>Сюда! Поглядим, за кого в этой битве стоит Халона!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ARTOIREL_BATTLETALK_006_005<tab>Ser Aymeric is still wounded, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! If we do not move quickly, he will surely fall!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ARTOIREL_BATTLETALK_006_005<tab>Сэр Эмерик ещё не оправился от своей раны, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Если мы не поторопимся, он наверняка погибнет!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TERRORIST_LEADER_BATTLETALK_006_006<tab>O Halone, render unto us Your judgment! Raise up the righteous, and cast down the wicked!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TERRORIST_LEADER_BATTLETALK_006_006<tab>Халона, сверши над нами правосудие! Превознеси праведных и покарай нечестивцев!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TERRORIST_LEADER_BATTLETALK_006_007<tab>Traitor! Kinslayer! By what sorcery do you yet stand!? Enough! All of you─attack!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TERRORIST_LEADER_BATTLETALK_006_007<tab>Предатель! Отцеубийца! Что это за колдовство, почему вы всё ещё живы?! Всё, хватит! Убейте их!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ARTOIREL_BATTLETALK_006_008<tab>I see no others nearby. Come, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Ser Aymeric needs our help!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ARTOIREL_BATTLETALK_006_008<tab>Поблизости никого. Пойдём, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Сэр Эмерик и остальные нуждаются в нашей помощи.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_BATTLETALK_006_009<tab>Well done! Now let us finish this, ser─before the eyes of gods and men!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_BATTLETALK_006_009<tab>Отлично! Теперь покончим с этим — пред ликом богов и людей!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TERRORIST_LEADER_BATTLETALK_006_010<tab>Stand fast, my brothers! The Fury is with us!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TERRORIST_LEADER_BATTLETALK_006_010<tab>Стойте насмерть, братья! С нами Яростная!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TERRORIST_LEADER_BATTLETALK_006_011<tab>One day...I swear...you will...
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_TERRORIST_LEADER_BATTLETALK_006_011<tab>Однажды... Клянусь, я...

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ARTOIREL_BATTLETALK_006_012<tab>There must be others nearby, but where!?
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ARTOIREL_BATTLETALK_006_012<tab>Другие должны быть поблизости, но где они?!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ARTOIREL_BATTLETALK_006_013<tab>Ser Aymeric's strength is almost spent, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! We must go to his aid at once!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ARTOIREL_BATTLETALK_006_013<tab>Сэр Эмерик уже на последнем издыхании, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Нужно поторопиться к нему на помощь!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_BATTLETALK_007_001<tab>Have no fear, child. We will save your friend!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_BATTLETALK_007_001<tab>Не бойся, дитя. Мы спасём твою подружку!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_HOSTAGE03_BATTLETALK_007_002<tab>You must hurry! The priest took Maelie upstairs when he saw you kill his men!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_HOSTAGE03_BATTLETALK_007_002<tab>Скорее! Жрец забрал Мэлли, когда увидел, что вы перебили его людей!

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_BATTLETALK_DEAD<tab>Damn it all...
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_BATTLETALK_DEAD<tab>Чтоб его...

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ARTOIREL_BATTLETALK_DEAD<tab>A knight lives to serve...
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ARTOIREL_BATTLETALK_DEAD<tab>Рыцарь живёт, чтобы служить...

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_BATTLETALK_HOSTAGE_DEAD<tab>No, NO! The hostages, they... O Halone, pray forgive me...
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_AYMERIC_BATTLETALK_HOSTAGE_DEAD<tab>Нет! НЕТ! Заложники, они... Халона, прости нас...

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ARTOIREL_BATTLETALK_HOSTAGE_DEAD<tab>Fury take me, they murdered them! And we allowed it to happen...
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ARTOIREL_BATTLETALK_HOSTAGE_DEAD<tab>Яростная забери меня, они их убили! Этого нельзя было допустить...

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_URIANGER_000_110<tab>...This is thy proof? <var 1A 02 /var>The Gerun Oracles<var 1A 01 /var>? Apocrypha.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_URIANGER_000_110<tab>...И это ваши доказательства? «Предсказания Герун»? Апокриф.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ELIDIBUSEORZEA_000_111<tab>(-???-)It is a truth long forgotten─a tale of the beginning, and of the path we have been set upon.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ELIDIBUSEORZEA_000_111<tab>(-???-)Это истина, давно забытая — история о начале пути, на который мы встали.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ELIDIBUSEORZEA_000_112<tab>(-Elidibus-)Our fates were ordained long ago, Archon. The Garleans are no exception. Nor the Triad. You know what must be done.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_ELIDIBUSEORZEA_000_112<tab>(-Элидибус-)Наши судьбы предопределены, архон. Как и судьбы гарлеанцев, Триады... Ты ведь знаешь, что делать.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_PAPALYMO_000_120<tab>...Well?
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_PAPALYMO_000_120<tab>...Ну и?

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YDA_000_121<tab>Everyone has their orders.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YDA_000_121<tab>Приказы переданы.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YDA_000_122<tab>The Masks will attack as soon as all units are in position. The imperials won't know what hit them.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YDA_000_122<tab>Маски атакуют, как только все будут на позициях. Гарлеанцы даже не узнают, от чьей руки погибли.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_PAPALYMO_000_123<tab>I fear it will be bloody...
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_PAPALYMO_000_123<tab>Будет много крови...

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YDA_000_124<tab>By Rhalgr, it had better be.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YDA_000_124<tab>Во имя Ралгра, я надеюсь на это.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_PAPALYMO_000_125<tab>We cannot stay here forever, Yda. We have other responsibilities.
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_PAPALYMO_000_125<tab>Нам нельзя оставаться здесь до бесконечности, Ида. У нас есть другие обязанности.

source: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YDA_000_126<tab>I know full well what my responsibilities are─and I mean to fulfill them, every one!
target: TEXT_HEAVNB108_02163_YDA_000_126<tab>Я прекрасно знаю о своих обязанностях — и не собираюсь отступать от них!
